Journal.Title: European journal of nuclear medicine and molecular imaging

Article.ArticleTitle: 2-[18F]-FDG PET for imaging brain involvement in patients with long COVID: perspective of the EANM Neuroimaging Committee.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: AV has received speaker honoraria from GE Healthcare and Philips. HB has received reader honoraria from LMI and speaker honoraria from AAA/Novartis. FF has received speaker honoraria and receives research funding from Siemens Healthineers. SM has received speaker honoraria from GE Healthcare, Roche, and LMI and is an advisor of LMI. EG has received consultant and speaker honoraria from GE Healthcare and CIS Bio International; and consultant honoraria from Advanced Accelerator Applications. The other authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
